text.more:
Graph of actors' interactions for the 'action' genre, considering the best 1000 movies by rating.
Nodes represent actors and edges “has worked with”-relationships. 
Edges are weighted in terms of the number and success of collaborations between two people. 
Each time two actors played in the same film, the rating of that movie is added to the weight.
text.title: Graph of actors' interactions for the 'action' genre, considering movie rating

legend.edgeLabel: “Has worked with”-relationships: actors have played in the same film
